scripts.start: bash -c 'unset ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE && unset ELECTRON_NO_ATTACH_CONSOLE && electron --disable-gpu --disable-software-rasterizer --no-sandbox app/main/index.js'
scripts.dev: bash -c 'unset ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE && unset ELECTRON_NO_ATTACH_CONSOLE && concurrently "vite --config vite.config.js" "electron --disable-gpu --disable-software-rasterizer --no-sandbox app/main/index.js"'
